Text:
function ERU_EP05_07()
    -- .起-3【2年前】「マリカとアルメリア」
    SaveData.Title = "マリカとアルメリア"

    -- //BG：姫神邸廊下（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ca")


    -- //BU：ネメシア（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    PLAY_BGM("BGM18.wav",0)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0185.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Normal
 "Armeria, how is it? How does the Yuriai Private Academy uniform feel to wear?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ARU01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0184.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Armeria】Smile
 "It's wonderful. As expected from Nemesia Mother’s alma mater. The material of the uniform is also fantastic." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0185.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Armeria】Smile
 "Until just a little while ago, Hermes was also super excited. Now she's fallen asleep from all the excitement though." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0186.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Normal
 "Hehe... Hermes is still mentally like a three-year-old, after all." ]])

    MSG([[ After undergoing full-body plastic surgery, I received thorough education not only about my appearance but also mentally. ]])

    MSG([[ The reason is because I am a deeply ingrained "introvert." ]])

    MSG([[ To act as the "ideal beautiful girl" Nemesia Mother dreams of, I must be able to behave completely differently from my usual self. ]])

    MSG([[ So, with Nemesia Mother’s cooperation, I underwent thorough mental training trying to create a new personality inside myself. ]])

    MSG([[ As a result, accidentally born was the pure and innocent personality "Hermes." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ARU01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0186.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Armeria】Normal
 "It's been three years since then, but there are no other cases where a completely new personality like Hermes has emerged, right?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0187.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Normal
 "It’s best that such cases remain rare. In your case, the loss of your original appearance is believed to be a cause of your lost identity." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ARU01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0187.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Armeria】Surprised
 "So, because the appearance was completely reborn, a new spirit was born too? That sounds kind of occult-ish." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01qa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0188.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Sneer
 "The human body is mysterious... Hearing, sight—when you lose something, it’s said other parts try to compensate. Considering Hermes as one of those compensations is fascinating." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ARU01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0188.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Armeria】Wry smile・Sweat
 "Mother, you’re making a bad face again. You're scary enough as it is, so please be careful." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0189.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Normal
 "...Hehe. A scary face suits me just fine. I intend to use you and Hermes to overturn this world’s concept of "beautiful girls."" ]])

    MSG([[ Two years ago. After many years of preparation, Nemesia Mother and I finally began taking action to dispute the world’s view of "beautiful girls." ]])

    MSG([[ We were prepared for the many criticisms we would endure. We understood it would demand many sacrifices. ]])

    MSG([[ Even so, I wanted to dedicate my heart for Nemesia Mother and become the foundation of her ambition. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01ra")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0190.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Sadness
 "...Sorry for asking you to do propaganda activities at Yuriai Academy alongside your idol work." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ARU01na")
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0189.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Armeria】Evil grin
 "Hehehe, I wanted to do it myself. Please don’t worry, Mother." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0191.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Normal
 "...You’re making a face as evil as mine. Also, can you stop with that 'dehehe' laugh?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ARU01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0190.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Armeria】Wry smile・Sweat
 "S-sorry... I haven’t really laughed much since I was a kid. Laughing is just hard for me." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01ra")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0192.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Sadness
 "I hope Hermes doesn’t start copying that..." ]])

STOP_BGM(2000)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：2-F廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //BU：モブ女子生徒×いっぱい
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,750,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-750,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,450,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-450,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_MOB08aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(70,150,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"BU_MOB09aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(75,-150,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0195.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female students】
 "Kyaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!! Hermes-samaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!!!" ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM17.wav",0)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERU01ia")
PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0548.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】Hermes wink
 "Bui bui! Good morning, everyone! Hermes-chan is full of energy today too!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ And so I enrolled in Yuriai Private Academy together with Hermes. ]])

    MSG([[ That said, I am only a shadow presence. ]])

    MSG([[ My role was to switch personas moderately to prevent Hermes from being overexcited or overly stressed. ]])

    MSG([[ Because Hermes is so pure and innocent, she easily trusts others and is susceptible to influence, which made this quite difficult... ]])

    MSG([[ At first, I could accept this as my role, but unconsciously stress began to build up inside me. ]])

    MSG([[ I truly think people who can continue to live as someone’s shadow are amazing. ]])

STOP_BGM(2000)

    -- //BU：マリカ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ And amid those days—I reunited with Marika. ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM06.wav",0)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0042.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Smile
 "So you’re the rumored transfer student." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERU01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0549.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】Smile
 "And you’re Marika Ikusa! I know, I know! You’re the amazing first-year who became the Imperial Princess!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0550.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】Smile
 "Just as rumored, you’re so cute~~~~<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> My heart skips a beat just looking at you~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0043.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Smile
 "Hehe, you’re the first adorable person like you I’ve met. Let’s get along from now on." ]])
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ —Meeting for the first time? I’ve known you for many years. ]])

    MSG([[ I understood Marika meant no ill will. Since I was completely different from before, it’s natural she didn’t recognize me. ]])

    MSG([[ Still, even knowing this intellectually, a black emotion uncontrollably welled up in my heart. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    -- //BG：屋上
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG017aa")
    -- //BU：マリカ（笑顔）、ダリア（苦笑）　
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01ea")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01fc")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0044.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Smile
 "My brother Mina-chan is truly pure, kind, and cute like an angel. I want everyone to meet him." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0692.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Wry smile
 "Hey, here comes that usual episode again. Ignore it, Hermes." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERU01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0551.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】Smile
 "Dehehe! Marika-chan really loves her little brother~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ After that, Hermes spent more time with Marika. ]])

    MSG([[ Without realizing the "me" inside Hermes, Marika would boast about the "brother" I know so well. ]])

    MSG([[ My black feelings slowly swelled inside my heart. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0045.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Smile
 "Mina-chan is really cute." ]])

    MSG([[ I know. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0046.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Smile
 "Mina-chan is always a kind child who thinks of others first." ]])

    MSG([[ I know. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0047.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Smile
 "Mina-chan always said he liked his big sister and stuck close to her." ]])

    MSG([[ —I KNOW!!! I know everything you know...! ]])

    MSG([[ Because I also... loved Mina-chan. ]])

    MSG([[ Listening to Marika talk about Mina-chan was living hell beyond anything else. ]])

    MSG([[ And that anger—exploded the day we defeated Marika in the Princess Election. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    -- //BG：屋上（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG017ca")
    -- //BU：マリカ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0048.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Normal
 "El-chan...? Why did you call me out here?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ARU01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0191.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Armeria】Normal
 "Despite being dethroned, you seem surprisingly calm." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0049.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Wry smile・Sweat
 "That’s a bit mean. I do feel bad for betraying everyone’s expectations." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0050.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Smile
 "But I’m glad it was El-chan who beat me. Because you always think about everyone else’s smiles." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0051.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Smile
 "I can trust you to be the Princess confidently. As a friend, I’ll continue to support you." ]])

    STOP_BGM(1000)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ARU01na")
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0192.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Armeria】Evil grin
 "...Dehehe. Always thinking about others’ smiles, huh? Maybe that fits Hermes." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0052.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Normal
 "...El-chan?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ARU01na")
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0193.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Armeria】Evil grin
 "Hey, don’t you realize yet? I am not Hermes now, I’m Armeria." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0194.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Armeria】Evil grin
 "I’m Inoue Arto, once called your best friend!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0053.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Surprised
 "Eh...? No, no way... Really!? Are you really Aru-chan!?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0054.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Smile
 "I’m so glad you’re alive... Because your mothers said Aru-chan had died――" ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav",0,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ARU01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0195.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Armeria】Serious
 "So... you didn’t notice?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0055.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Surprised
 "...Eh?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ARU01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0196.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Armeria】Serious
 "Because I thought I was dead! I’m asking why you never noticed the me inside Hermes!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0197.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Armeria】Serious
 "Even though you called me your best friend! You liar!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0056.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Sadness
 "Th-That’s not true... I-I just never imagined that Aru-chan could be alive..." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ARU01na")
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0198.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Armeria】Evil grin
 "You smugly boasted about Mina-chan so much! Do you know how much pain I endured? How much I suffered?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0199.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Armeria】Evil grin
 "I’m truly happy to have taken the title of Princess away from you! I hate you so much! You heartless person!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0057.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Sadness
 "No, that’s not... I, I..." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BG000aa")
    LAYER_ALPHA(60,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,100,1000,Ease.Liner)

    MSG([[ The pain, suffering, and sadness I had bottled up for five years ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(61,"BG000aa")
    LAYER_ALPHA(61,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(61,100,1000,Ease.Liner)

    MSG([[ all flew out as curses from my mouth. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(62,"BG000aa")
    LAYER_ALPHA(62,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(62,100,1000,Ease.Liner)

    MSG([[ Halfway through, even I lost understanding of myself, and before I knew it―― ]])

STOP_BGM(2000)

    -- //BU：なし
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(61,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(62,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG017ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ARU01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0200.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Armeria】Surprised
 "...M-Mari-chan?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0693.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "M-MARIKAーーーーーー!? What’s wrong, hang in there!" ]])

    MSG([[ Daria Onee-sama’s voice brought me to my senses, and I hurriedly went down from the rooftop. ]])

    -- //BG：４F廊下（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013cd")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029" , 500,false)

    -- //BU：ダリア（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0694.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Serious
 "Marika! Hey, hang in there Marika!" ]])

    -- //CI：160
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"CI160a")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,0,-200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ What I witnessed was Marika collapsed, bleeding from the head. ]])

    MSG([[ She must have hit her head on the stairs and was unconscious; Daria Onee-sama was desperately calling out to her. ]])

    MSG([[ ...What is this? I never wanted this. ]])

    MSG([[ I just wanted a little revenge. I wanted to release the emotions I had bottled up on Marika. ]])

    MSG([[ I just wanted Mari-chan to notice me... so why did it come to this? ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0695.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Serious
 "Armeria, is this your doing? What did you do to Marika?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ARU01da")
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0201.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Armeria】Sadness
 "N-No...! I didn’t do anything... I didn’t do anything!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0696.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Serious
 "...We’ll talk later. Get out of the academy now before anyone sees something unnecessary." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0697.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Serious
 "I’m also guilty for pushing Marika so far. I’ll take care of everything from here on." ]])

    MSG([[ With a blank mind, I could only obey Daria Onee-sama’s orders. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：病室（夕方）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav",0)

    MSG([[ And as Mina-chan knows... Marika did not wake up. ]])

    MSG([[ Daria Onee-sama felt guilty, but the one who drove her mentally the most was me. ]])

    MSG([[ Unable to find a way, Daria Onee-sama told me an even sadder truth. ]])

    -- //BU：ダリア（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0698.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Serious
 "Armeria, I don’t know what happened between you and Marika. I don't intend to investigate. But... please know this." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0699.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Sadness
 "The last words Marika said before losing consciousness were... an apology to you." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ARU01da")
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0202.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Armeria】Sadness
 "A-a apology...? Marika said that to me after I said such terrible things...?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0203.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Armeria】Sadness
 "Mari-chan... aaahhh..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0204.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Armeria】Sadness
 "Uwaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaah!!!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Afterwards, Daria Onee-sama told me how much Marika struggled and suffered, continuing to act out the "ideal of people" without letting anyone know. ]])

    MSG([[ Coincidentally, it was exactly the same struggle that Hermes and I are now facing together. ]])

    MSG([[ After ten years, I finally understood Marika’s feelings. I had pushed my greatest supporter into the abyss with my own hands. ]])

    MSG([[ The only choice left for me. There was only one way to atone to Marika left.]])

    -- 　　　　◆
--STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERU_EP05_08")
end
